post.desc:
This applies to a lot of characters, I suppose. 😕

Though I also suppose I do have something for Shō. The spear motif seems to be exclusive to Bishamonten – the Japanese rendition. Vaiśravaṇa, the original, usually carries an umbrella. So yeah, I like to think that Shō sometimes carries an umbrella around – or substitutes with Kogasa. Actually, the symbolism might be the reason why Byakuren keeps her around the cemetery? 🤔

Check out Black Myth if you want to see him in action.
